website_summaries.verdict: If you hate AA batteries, but like inexpensive compacts with manual controls, the 16x zoom Canon PowerShot SX170 IS takes a good photo. Otherwise, seek out its predecessor, the SX160 IS.
pros: The Canon PowerShot SX170 IS is a good choice for budget-conscious buyers who want to do more than point-and-shoot, thanks to its semimanual and manual shooting modes and large, comfortable controls
cons: Despite the switch to a rechargeable battery, the SX170 is still pretty bulky and its shooting performance is too slow for fast-moving subjects like kids and pets -- especially indoors

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smaller camera that took good pictures and I could take on hikes or times when I don't want to lug around my large camera and its multiple lenses. It takes great pictures. The settings are easy to use. I like that it uses a camera battery and not AA batteries. Other cameras that I have had that use the AA batteries go dead so quickly. This battery stays charged for months without any problems. My only complaint would be that when you need the flash, it will tell you to lift the flash up. It doesn't automatically pop up when needed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: always the greatest
customer_reviews.text: i started out with the first canon sure shot , have owned one ever since, its the best camera to me ever made. i have had 3 or 4 of them and they have been in my pocket or purse every single day since my first purchase , they have been to europe and were still going strong to hawaii and then to norway , my canon will be with me always, it captures the best pictures, would not buy another brand but canon for me , for someone else no, but mine will be canon
customer_reviews.author: barbara james

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price, it takes good quality photos and has good speed. I use my camera for everything, indoors & outdoors and I haven't had any problems with the quality of pics. I rarely have to change the settings, I keep it on auto and it does all the work I just point and shoot. The only thing is you have to be careful with the flash because it sits on top of the camera and flips out.
customer_reviews.author: VBLove

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot. I am a dslr person but I wanted a small camera for everyday. This one works great. The only thing is the flash is manual. You have to pick it up and it feels a little cheap. Pictures come out great. I get to keep it in my purse for spur of the moment pictures. I also bought the case that fits perfectly for added security to protect it if I drop it but I wear it around my neck. You can take pictures with the case on it so that's a plus so I would get the case also
customer_reviews.author: Kathchrstn

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures for Pro Use but Soft Display Screen
customer_reviews.text: It takes great pictures. I use it for work where I need high quality pictures for photo simulations (I build cell towers). My photo sim lady said the pictures looked great. The price was good. The strap is convenient for carrying from intersection to intersection as I get good shots. The red color is beautiful. My only complaint is the display screen is not of awesome quality & was scratched within a couple days. I should have kept it in a case & I guess that is my fault but I was surprised at how fast it scratched with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: This camera needed a better LCD
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this camera being i had the sx120 for some time and the features on the newer model looked promising but i was shocked to find out it still had low the resolution lcd screen from my old model and the terrible grainy and fuzzy view you get from indoors and low light on the screen like a old tv channel the x-tra zoom seemed nice but the lack of advancement on there lcd screen made me send it back.I am going to reorder a newer and different model in hopes the lcd screen has advanced and much better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: timlee67

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my new camera.
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. Does everything I expect from a $100ish camera. Red was a plus. Battery life is great, but I don't use video and turn it off immediately when I'm done shooting. Fits so much better in my hand than a smartphone. On a non-relevant note, the Prime shipping was absolutely amazing. Ordered this at midnight on a Friday and it was on my doorstep by 10am Saturday. Didn't even choose 1-day shipping but came in less than 12 hours anyhow. Unbelievable. 6 stars for shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ritzert

customer_reviews.title: Excellente cam!
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent camera. The photos look great, is some noise on the screen only when you are in dark places, but in places where light is sharpen the image on the screen. (That is not a fault, the photos are great!) It is not a professional camera, it is a high quality camera for people like me that I do not do photography professionally. It also has very good video quality. Thank you very much to Amazon and Canon. No need to pay for a more expensive camera (if you're not a professional photographer). This camera is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Borges

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I like the software that loads it to your computer- It also comes with a flat battery that you can charge so you don'[t have to keep buying batteries. The SX 150 I had used lithium batteries but they lasted a good while but I like the new "chargeable battery" It did NOT come with a USB cable but I used the one that came with SX150 I had and it works just fine. The manuals are also on the Canon website,. Nice camera-easy to use-
customer_reviews.author: Phantomsue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it and has already taken very nice pictures with very little tutoring and no training. After much research online I settled on the Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP camera for the price point I was looking for. I believe it is the best camera at this price point and produces very nice pictures all things being considered.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all Trades

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing! Not only was this the best price I found anywhere, but the camera quality is amazing. I haven't had any problems with it at all, and I've had it for about a year and a half now. It takes amazing, high-quality photos, as well as videos. This camera is great for anybody who is into vlogging, and its a great starter camera for photographers. For such a small camera, it is one of the best on the market for this price. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Camera for simple uses
customer_reviews.text: Even though this camera is a little old, I love it. I chose to get the Canon because Canon has a good name among cameras. The one camera on my phone is a little grainy but this camera is nice and does a great job for vacation photos and around the house and neighborhood. I wouldn't suggest it for anyone but an amateur obviously and those of us who don't need to have a fancy camera for simple uses. But if you want something a little better than a phone camera, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good camera at a good price
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I want and is very user friendly. Picture quality is very good for my purposes. My primary use is posting photos on the computer. If I want 11x14 prints I use my Canon EOS SLR. One thing I don't like is that it does not have an eye-level viewer. Maybe I just have to get used to it but I have great difficulty composing outdoors on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: big nick

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I just love the wide angle lens. The camera is a bit heavier than the old one I had in my purse but the pictures are so good so I'm happy with it. The 16X zoom makes for a great close-in picture. The only wish I have is that the lag was even shorter and the lens a little faster. The auto stabilization works well but I still get blurred shots with moving targets even when they aren't moving fast. Then I really need my DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to a powershot I broke. This is a great little camera. The zoom feature is fantastic. It does not have all the features my older powershot had (black and white photo with one color showing, change the color of something before taking the picture). It's also a bit bulky. The pictures are beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch and Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera, Great Quality Build and Pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is about the best Digital Camera you can get for less than $200 and before you step up to Either a DSLR or something even better. It's light, yet rather durable and feels good in your hands. The pictures are outstanding, especially during Mid-Day captures, but even under really bright surroundings or low light situations, the camera performs marvelously. I've always leaned towards Canon products, whether it be Camera's or Printers or Anything else, and I have yet to be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Brought it to the snow and it did a good job. However I found the automatic mode to be better than the snow mode for those type of pictures. Was able to take pictures of the moon with some practice. (Apparently a tripod is required for moon stabilizing) The zoom is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Squad

customer_reviews.title: OK for trips but surpased with newer devices.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for a small point ad shoot. Video is above the still pics however in quality. Does not adjust to bright light well in still modes, easily surpassed by smart phone cameras of today. A great back up camera to have on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I've had Nikon and Canon cameras and prefer the Canon. I've found the brand to be easier to use and more reliable with better pictures. I really like this camera but give it 4 stars because you're limited without it being an SLR. But it's more compact, easier to use, and cheaper than an SLR. I got it to replace another one I broke doing a face-plant out in the wild! It does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's working great and takes wonderful pictures not just for family, friends and special Occasions. I use it to sell online. I am really glad I bought it. It makes picture taking easier and the quality of pictures makes all of us happier not to be struggling with picture editing.
customer_reviews.author: Starwalker

customer_reviews.title: So light weight feels like a kids toy
customer_reviews.text: So light weight feels like a kids toy. Quality is so so. No happy with purchase. Gave away to a young teen.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Camera takes great pictures but the operation takes getting use unlikely my ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes great pictures but the operation takes getting use unlikely my A-720 that broke (A-720's battery lid lost its "nubs" and wont lock shut). The picture quality is better than my old A-720 but that is understandable since the SX170 has 2x the pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanovich

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not a SIMPLE camera but certainly worth learning. I wanted simple but I am getting it. The zoom is a problem for me, you have to hold VERY still or it blurs. Not happy about that, sometimes just pushing the button blurs the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Just Teri

customer_reviews.title: Hot Camera for the Average Photog
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding camera and a great value for the average photographer. Takes excellent shots lots of auto control as well as manual setting and video. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: A good travel camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is an ideal travel companion. It is small but not too small. It has optical zoom for those faraway images. It is Canon quality and all at a decent price. It's made in Japan so I know the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Matt07924

customer_reviews.title: PowerShot indeed
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera with a 16 gb memory card and battery for $99. Great deal, and five months later it is still selling for $50 more at Wal-Mart who just started carrying it last month... Great deal, and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sam-Wise

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: would not buy again. would return this! the pictures do not come out clear at all. does not pick up on movement well at all. even still pictures do not come out well. tried changing the settings several times and nothing works well. my brother who is a professional photographer said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I AM NOT A PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHER! I just use it in special occasions. However I am really pleased with the photos I have taken, they are great even though you cant see how the photo really looks like until you print them out. Great quality. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great! I usually get a cheap digital but my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! I usually get a cheap digital but my son wanted me to get something that would last longer. I am so pleased with this camera and it takes really good shots. I love the close-up shots! I would definitely recommend this for all those looking for a simple good camera!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Canon SX150 for several years which I liked very much, with the exception that it "ate" batteries. The new one has all the features that I enjoyed on the SX150 plus some new ones, such as the movie button. This camera also has Lithium batteries which should give much better life than AA batteries. I like the size and versatility of the camera. I think this camera is a hit! ROB
customer_reviews.author: Roy Braughler

customer_reviews.title: This Camera for the price works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my needs. Battery life gives me about 400 low res. pics with a 3 sec review. Thought I wouldn't like the idea of not being able to use 2 rechargeable batteries like my last camera. But so far, the camera is working great.
customer_reviews.author: HowOui

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: What a great little camera this is. Easy to see the large display screen. Takes excellent pix. Batteries last reasonably well. Like the recharge unit - small and compact. Plenty of good features on this camera. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lance C. Wetteland

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures! Bought this for my 9-year-old, who is a budding photog, and she's had a blast using it. Pretty easy to figure out, has lots of good features, and takes better shots than my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: This camera, purchased for a trip to Europe has turned out to be the camera I use all the time. The lens length gives me a bit more flex when using the camera and of course the extreme quality of photos as are all Canon products. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little camera packed with lots of features worth having
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little camera packed with lots of features worth having. Bought the camera for my wife for the ease of operation. Even has high definition video recording with a separate, one button ease. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: HipV

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot, good zoom
customer_reviews.text: The SX170 is great, and has a nice zoom. I like that the flash doesn't automatically flip up, allowing me more control of when I used the flash. I got it in red, and I like the color. It's a soft red, not too obnoxious. I bought a pretty compact case, and this camera JUST fits. For a point and shoot, I'd say this was a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: EmKayBee

customer_reviews.title: this was a good camera until i dropped it off the floatplane into ...
customer_reviews.text: this was a good camera until i dropped it off the floatplane into the pond. fished it out and the camera was dead, never did come back, but the photos were ok on the sd card
customer_reviews.author: rojo

customer_reviews.title: when i saw it on amazon for a reduced price because of the discontinued color it was great. i have had the earlier model of this
customer_reviews.text: i looked for this particular camera for a while in local stores and was unable to find it. when i saw it on amazon for a reduced price because of the discontinued color it was great. i have had the earlier model of this camera for 11 years and it finally stopped working. i love my new camera as much as my old one..the pictures are great, the camera is easy to operate..
customer_reviews.author: julie fuino

customer_reviews.title: love, love
customer_reviews.text: love , love.... Plain, simple. I dont break my head trying to find out how to do this or that... awsome price... Thank you very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Perez

customer_reviews.title: Cool little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon said that I would receive a free SD Card with my order. I didn't realize that I had to go into another screen and order the SD Card. I thought it was automatically included with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Conn

customer_reviews.title: Nice photos -- easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice photos -- easy to use. The video recording button is at the top corner and I accidently hit it a lot and end up with a video, but other than that, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dachton

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little camera. As a professional photographer I wanted something small for life's little moments so I didn't have to lug out the "big camera" all the time.
customer_reviews.author: faithhovde

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, zoom and easy to work but the battery doesn't last very long. Buy a spare.
customer_reviews.author: retdtc

customer_reviews.title: a fine camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and great pictures. really like it . have an older Powershot A 75. Canon is on their game.
customer_reviews.author: NIck K

customer_reviews.title: it's her new favorite camera. So
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and according to her, it's her new favorite camera. So, I'll take that as all good!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good camera...but
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera but I wish the flash could be automatic if you wanted and I would like it more if it was a bit faster processing between one pic to the next.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea30

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Used constantly. Happy with the quality, simplicity and durability. Only problem is that photos at high zoom levels are not crisp-but that is not what this camera is for.
customer_reviews.author: Carl F. Alessi

customer_reviews.title: Super for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera a lot....takes great pics and the zoom is great...and the look (I got the red one) is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: fantasm

customer_reviews.title: ... for my type of everyday use it will be great.
customer_reviews.text: I mhaven't used it much to date but sofar for my type of everyday use it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the 16x optical zoom. Not too many cameras have this much zoom. It is easy to operate and I'm getting great pictures!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Cavallini

customer_reviews.title: Canon Power Shot RED
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to learn the ropes. But I love the pictures it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. De Lauder

customer_reviews.title: i love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Easy to use, great photographs, adjustable, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: nice camera, but it was not exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: nice camera, but it was not exactly what I can use, so I gave it to my grandson, but it is okay
customer_reviews.author: camar c-m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: takes great pictures and is small and easy to carry around. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Susan Casebeer

customer_reviews.title: great camera for price
customer_reviews.text: makes great pic's always. no mauel thou you have to downlowd to know how to use
customer_reviews.author: ABE

customer_reviews.title: Cool Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for my novice photo needs and the zoom is excellent for mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Hondo

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: still getting used to using the new camera...so far pics are very good....was unhappy that manual didnt come with camera and needs to be downloaded from website...tried but had problems
customer_reviews.author: holmes19

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you have an iPhone you're better off using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pics and easy to use, bought it for work and clients love the pics
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Young photographer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Canon Powershot SX170 for my 12 year old grand daughter. She loves this camera. She is really getting into photography, and wanted a nice camera that is easy to use. This was perfect. Lightweight so easy to carry around anywhere you go. The styling resembles the DSLR's, which was not going to be an option for her as way tooo costly for a teen! She really adores her new camera, and grandma is so happy with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: beach granny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent little, convenient, portable camera. A step up from my cell phone camera.
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Pass this one up...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know why this camera gets all the good reviews. I bought this for my wife, and sports pictures turn out blurry, and the flash is always an issue. The main issue is that we often forget to lift up the flash hinge, so the flash doesn't work. It would be really nice if their was a reminder on the screen about manually lifting up the flash - it's hard to remember everything when you are in a hurry to get a picture. We are getting rid of this one, and will make sure our next camera has an exposed flash, and is easier to use. Everything about this camera has been difficult...
customer_reviews.author: K. Matney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot option
customer_reviews.text: If you want a class A product without spend tons of money, i totally recommend this. The pictures are awesome and there has lots of predefined configurations so you dont waste the time reading manuals with 1000 pages :) I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastián Peña

customer_reviews.title: great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she really loves it, easy to use and beautiful style and color :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this camera. Easy to use and compact enough to fit in my purse. Good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera with easy to understand features. Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to figure out how to use. Definitely not for the tech challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Office Manager

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my sister and brother-in-law for Christmas last year. They are really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good easy to hold still while taking a picture.
customer_reviews.author: CRH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: quite big, big pics and u need a big simcard
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Took awesome pictures of my time in Canada.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: What I expected so far.
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to replace an identical model I got with my AMEX points that quit working after 30 days. When I contacted Canon repair they wanted the price of a new one to repair it so I just got a new one instead. One difference: it uses a rechargeable battery pack instead of the old one which used AA's like they were popcorn, so on that account, it's better.
customer_reviews.author: bbkong

customer_reviews.title: Cannon SX170 camera
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera. The pictures come out great. Just wish it would have come with a more extensive manual. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Renata D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera, still need to figure out the special effects.
customer_reviews.author: Agdstuck

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: 8 months after purchase and the card slot is broken - it wont hold the card
customer_reviews.author: Julie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: camera canon powershot
customer_reviews.text: The camera was as expected, it is really great, my friend is happy with her camera, actually I just bought it here but it is not mine. Thanks for the good service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good camera on time delivery very happy what I have ...
customer_reviews.text: very good camera on time delivery very happy what I have and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Regan

customer_reviews.title: Camera OK, manual not included
customer_reviews.text: A major drawback is that this machine, which I haven't had for more than a few weeks and seems pretty easy to use, does not come with a manual. It is online and you have to download it. Pain!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality; Regret Buying This
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. I have had this camera for three years and should have returned it. I was convinced that maybe I just wasn't using the correct settings. I was and have tried to use this camera multiple times throughout the years and it always dissapoints me. I've never been able to use a single photo that I have taken with it. Hopefully mine was just a fluke otherwise it is beyond me how this got anything above one star ratings.
customer_reviews.author: LilaElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Giving it as a gift this summer
customer_reviews.text: Was given this camera as a Christmas gift. Love it! Giving it as a gift this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Recommending
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera. I was using it and it is in perfect condition as described. I recommend it for all next buyers. Really enjoy using it
customer_reviews.author: Dragan Nakic

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! Great photos. A true point n shoot camera. Although I love it, if I had to do it again I would buy the SX160. After doing the research I found the only difference is the price. The 160 goes for 100 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Steel

customer_reviews.title: Have to pay extra for basic items.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use, takes excellent pictures... only reason I knocked off a point was because camera came with a battery charger, but not with a USB cord, Being a digital camera, only makes sense that it should come with USB cord. Also, did not come with any SD card, have to buy that separately too.
customer_reviews.author: MD42

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures. The zoom is great! I recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to use - have to pay for the manuel
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that this camera is one of the best but for me, I wanted something that was simple and easy to use. I still haven't learned all the many features available. I was really disappointed when I went to the webpage to find a manuel. I didn't expect to pay for it!! Eventually, I think as I become more familiar with my camera I will like it, but as of today, I am still trying to figure things out.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had Canon cameras before and still use the larger one, but this compact camera is perfect for my purse and does excellent quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Buller

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law and she loves the camera. It's a cannon so I had no worries about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: The PowerShot SX170 camera works great, takes very clear pictures and is easy to operate. It was a super value.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It was described and I love the product. I would recommend this to any new camera buyer. What a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Christianna Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera and VERY well made. I am really impressed with the quality of the videos and the 'zoom' function. A perfect marriage of point and shoot simplicity yet all the functionality of a SLR when needed. GW
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little camera. Easy to use after we read the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Derby Lady

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot
customer_reviews.text: My old canon bit the dust. I had it repaired once but now it's done and been replaced by a newer model. The new model is heavier but the pictures are much bigger and better. Technology just keeps getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister. Its packed with features and is very compact. Its quite handy with pretty high MP and optical zoom. Video feature also works very well. Very good non-SLR camera in general.
customer_reviews.author: @sh

customer_reviews.title: Bulky And Hard To Use
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this camera again! It's too complicated to actually use it functionally. You have to be on line reading the not included user manual while trying to use this thing. It's also too bulky for what it does. I'd stick with the Panasonic Lumix anyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wegienka

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was Everything it was advertised to be. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Frank David

customer_reviews.title: An OK camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my wife. I use several Canon DSLR's, but she just wants to "point and shoot". This Canon is rather large but very light. It tended to feel a bit cheap. The photos were alright for the price of the camera, but nothing to get excited about. I returned it and bought the Panasonic Lumix DMC. It's $300 but it is very compact, takes great photos and is simple to use. The one additional pet peeve I had with this camera is that Canon does not supply an owners manual. You have to download it from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Woodshop Man

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Battery and usb cord not included. Had to purchase these before I could use the camera. I didn't catch that I would have to make a trip to store before I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen A. Jass

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera at a great price. This is not a professional camera, but it's an excellent day to day one. 16Mp are more than enough for everyday photos. The size is just perfect, you can carry it everywhere without the need for extra cases or bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Luis Gutiérrez González

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was bought for a gift and they loved it..
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burger

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot sx170IS Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera but I would like a guide to direct me to its many uses and This was not enclosed with the camera. It would be very helpful to get this information to the customers.
customer_reviews.author: T J

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera, Red (discontinued by manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
The Canon PowerShot SX170 IS Digital Camera is a compact, point-and-shoot featuring a 16 megapixel 1/2.3" CCD sensor and DIGIC 4 image processor to produce high-resolution, well-detailed stills and HD 720p video. The processor also works to provide reduced noise levels and overall image clarity as well as power throughout the camera to enable a High Speed AF system and intelligent auto shooting modes. The built-in Canon 16x optical zoom lens provides a 35mm-equivalent focal length range of 28-448mm, covering wide-angle to telephoto lengths for shooting in nearly any environment. Intelligent IS image stabilization is also available and features six unique stabilization modes suited to different types of shooting. For image composition, playback, and menu navigation, a 3.0-inch 230k-dot LCD is available and features a wide viewing angle to support use in bright conditions. The SX170 IS also features a refined ergonomic design to increase comfort during use.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 Untitled Document 

ZOOM BIG, SHOOT COMFORTABLY
Zoom in on images you're not likely to capture with a smartphone. The 16x Optical Zoom on the PowerShot SX170 IS camera gets you up close to kids and wildlife, down on the field and up on the stage, while Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer keeps images steady and clear. The 28mm Wide-Angle lens captures everything from large family shots to breathtaking landscapes. With the 16.0 Megapixel sensor, you can crop and enlarge all you want, and the DIGIC 4 Image Processor ensures fast, precise performance. Relive fun times in smooth, detailed 720p HD video. Or simply point and shoot for excellent stills quality in all kinds of situations: Smart AUTO senses the conditions and chooses optimized camera settings for 32 pre-defined scenes. High Speed AF captures quick action shots, and Intelligent IS counteracts camera shake for virtually blur-free shooting. Easily see what you're shooting and show off what you've captured on the big, clear 3.0-inch LCD screen. Powered by a slim, new rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the PowerShot SX170 IS sports an even smaller, more ergonomic design that makes this the perfect camera to have at the ready all day long.

PRECISION CANON OPTICS
POWERFUL 16X OPTICAL ZOOM WITH 28MM WIDE-ANGLE LENS
The PowerShot SX170 IS camera features a powerful Genuine Canon 16x Optical Zoom Lens that delivers outstanding optical performance and versatility. With precision engineering and decades of leadership in optical technologies, Canon has created a bright, wide-angle lens that provides an extraordinary 16x zoom range. The lens starts at 28mm wide-angle and extends to 448mm telephoto (35mm equivalent), giving you tremendous coverage and reach. The telephoto end lets you capture subjects from a considerable distance, while the 28mm wide-angle makes it easy to shoot sweeping landscapes, large groups of people and tall buildings. Moreover, this superb lens incorporates innovative designs that enable it to fit the compact profile of the PowerShot SX170 IS.

POWERFUL CORE SPECS DELIVER BEAUTIFUL IMAGES
16.0 MEGAPIXEL IMAGE SENSOR
The PowerShot SX170 IS camera's 16.0 Megapixel CCD sensor delivers impressive photos with fine detail and brilliant color. The high resolution ensures superb image quality even when cropping or making very large prints.

CANON DIGIC 4 IMAGE PROCESSOR
Canon DIGIC Image Processors have set the standard for functionality and performance since their groundbreaking introduction in 1999. With each successive generation, DIGIC Image Processors have brought elevated performance and powerful new features to PowerShot digital cameras. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor has ushered in high levels of picture quality and accelerated processing, making possible features such as high-speed continuous shooting, HD video and Face Detection Self-timer. More powerful noise reduction algorithms also provide improved low-light capture.

PRESERVE AND SHARE YOUR MEMORIES IN SPECTACULAR HD
CANON HD VIDEO ADVANTAGE
The PowerShot SX170 IS camera lets you record highly detailed 720p HD video at 25 frames per second with clear stereo sound. Imagine the fun and excitement of being able to shoot high definition video whenever you want, right from your compact digital camera.

DEDICATED MOVIE BUTTON, WIND FILTER FEATURE AND OPTICAL ZOOM WHILE SHOOTING
It's never been easier to shoot videos with a PowerShot digital camera. The PowerShot SX170 IS camera has a dedicated movie button that lets you start and stop recording instantly. The camera is always ready to shoot stills or video whenever you want. The camera also incorporates an electronic wind filter, which suppresses wind noise that can muffle or distort the sound. The PowerShot SX170 IS lets you use the full range of optical zoom when you're shooting a video without sacrificing HD video resolution.

A SMARTER CAMERA MEANS BETTER PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
SMART AUTO
The PowerShot SX170 IS camera features Smart AUTO: sophisticated Canon technology that makes getting that great shot as simple as pressing the shutter button. Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. Detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture, whether you're shooting stills or video. Smart AUTO also includes Advanced Subject Detection, which allows the camera to detect and track non-human moving subjects like animals and vehicles. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

FASTER FOCUS HELPS YOU CAPTURE EVERY SHOT
HIGH SPEED AF
The PowerShot SX170 IS camera is equipped with Canon's latest advancements in autofocus (AF) technology. Working on multiple fronts, Canon has developed AF that is significantly faster than on previous models, for a shooting experience that's spontaneous and natural. The extremely responsive High Speed AF lets you capture great shots as they happen, with reduced lag time.

Several engineering breakthroughs contributed to this major enhancement to speed. In addition to improved AF algorithms, the camera can process multiple sequences simultaneously, and takes advantage of reworked controls between AF and the start of shooting.

A STEADY IMAGE IS A BEAUTIFUL IMAGE
INTELLIGENT IS
The latest advance in Canon Optical Image Stabilization technology, Intelligent IS, analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation. For stills, the system automatically selects among Normal, Panning, Macro (Hybrid) and Tripod IS modes. When shooting video, the system automatically selects among Dynamic, Powered, Macro and Tripod IS modes. With Intelligent IS, you can concentrate on image capture, letting the camera make the most effective IS settings to help capture the steadiest possible image.

Normal Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Macro (Hybrid) Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Dynamic Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Tripod When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. SEE WHAT YOU'RE SHOOTING ON A CLEAR, BIG SCREEN
LARGE 3.0-INCH LCD SCREEN
Easy to see from a wide angle, the camera's 3.0-inch LCD screen with a great resolution of approximately 230,000 dots gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear picture to make shooting, playback and using the camera's menu functions especially convenient.

SMALLER AND MORE COMFORTABLE THAN EVER
RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM-ION BATTERY
Just pick up the PowerShot SX170 IS camera and you'll discover how comfortable a super-compact camera can be! The new ergonomic design and smaller size are the result of a slim new rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
SHOOTING MODES
PowerShot cameras offer shooting modes that make it easy to take perfect photos in a wide range of shooting situations by providing intelligent presets with optimized settings.

Manual You have complete control of exposure, selecting both aperture and shutter speed manually. Aperture-Priority You set the aperture, controlling depth-of-field. The camera automatically selects the shutter speed. Shutter-priority You select the shutter speed to stop or blur action, and the camera finds the appropriate aperture. With slow exposure times, Canon's noise reduction system activates to ensure low image noise. Program Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically. Live View Control Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls. Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Portrait The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.” Face Self-timer The camera waits for a face to enter the frame before releasing the shutter. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Creative Filters This setting provides easy access to special filter effects and scene modes, such as Toy Camera Effect, Poster Effect, Monochrome and more. Discreet Mode Disables flash, AF assist beam, and all camera sounds with one mode dial setting – so you can capture images in quiet areas. Movie Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode. SPECIAL SCENE MODES WITH CREATIVE FILTERS
Special Scene Modes have fun and creative filters you can add to your photos without having to use a computer. You can make a quirky portrait using a Fisheye Lens Effect or add a beautiful single-tone effect with Monochrome. Toy Camera Effect simulates a vintage look as if capturing the photo using a toy or pinhole camera. Make a scene appear like a small-scale model with Miniature Effect, when shooting from a high vantage point. Super Vivid enhances an image for bright, intense colors while Poster Effect alters the contrast of an image for poster-like presentation.

ECO MODE
The PowerShot SX170 IS camera takes energy conservation to the next level with ECO Mode, which provides more shots per single charge through monitor and camera power management. ECO Mode can be activated for easy power preservation when an outlet is unavailable. ECO Mode quickly wakes the camera from sleep when a button is pressed or with a touch of the LCD screen. With ECO Mode, you can be sure that your camera will keep up when fun with family and friends runs late into the night!

AVAILABLE IN 30 LANGUAGES
There are now a total of 30 display languages from which you can choose: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Romanian, Ukrainian, Farsi, Hindi, Malay, Indonesian and Vietnamese.
feature_bullets: Capture impressive 720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button and zoom while shooting video
Large 3-inch TFT color LCD offers easy viewing even from a wide angle
16 megapixel, 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 image processor deliver enhanced image quality
Powerful 16x optical zoom and 28mm wide-angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer
Smart Auto intelligently selects the proper settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars210 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
